workshop.title: Cloud Accelerate: Oracle Autonomous Integration Cloud (AOIC) Developer Workshop
workshop.description: A hands-on event to explore Oracleâ€™s Autonomous Integration Cloud.

labs.title: Home
labs.description: Welcome to the Oracle Autonomous Integration Cloud (AOIC) Integration workshop

labs.title: Lab 100: Exploring ICS
labs.description: This lab will expose you to the functionality in OIC Integration.

labs.title: Lab 200: Basic ICS Development
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to build a 'hello world' echo service.

labs.title: Lab 300: Database Integration
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to develop an integration into an on-premesis backend database system using an OIC Integration orchestration.

labs.title: Lab 400: EBS Integration
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to create an integration into an on-premesis backend EBS system using an OIC Integration orchestration.

labs.title: Lab 500: Create Approval Workflow to process orders
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to use AIC Process Automation capability to implement a Business Process that will be triggered for Declined orders from process orders web service call.

labs.title: Lab 600: Add ABCS Screen to Trigger Process Order Web Service
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to use AIC ABCS to create a UI, then call Process Orders Web Service.

labs.title: Lab 700: Add ABCS logic to Trigger Approval Workflow
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to use AIC ABCS to invoke Approval Workflow when a Declined Order is returned from Web Service call

labs.title: Lab 800: API Management Lab, Add Process Order web service to APIPCS
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to use APIPCS to add an API for Process Orders Web Service and secure the API using Policies.

labs.title: Lab 900: Integration Analytics Implementation
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to implement an Integration Analytics Model with Milestones for Process Orders Integration Flow.
